div.p: >> Bill: BACK OF THE BOOK SEGMENT TONIGHT.
WATTERS WORLD. ONE OF THE REASONS MILLIONS
OF PEOPLE COME TO THE U.S.A. IS BECAUSE THEY CAN
MAKE A DECENT LIVING HERE. NOWHERE IS THAT MORE
APPARENT THAN IN NEW YORK CITY.
MANY IMMIGRANTS BOTH LEGAL AND ILLEGAL DRIVE TAXI
CABS. SO WE SENT WATTERS OUT TO
CHECK OUT THAT SITUATION. ♫ ♫ ♫
>> SO, WHERE ARE YOU FROM? >> PAKISTAN.
>> I'M FROM CHECH. >> DOMINICAN REPUBLIC.
>> CASA BLANCA. >> THERE YOU GO CLASSY
SPOT. >> DISAPPEAR FROM
CASABLANCA FOR A WHILE. >> MUST BE AN EXCITING
PLACE. >> YEAH.
[ LAUGHTER ] >> I WAS BORN IN HATEY.
>> INDIA. >> GOOD FOOD.
>> THERE SPICY. >> WHAT DID WE EAT?
>> WHEN DID YOU COME TO AMERICA?
>> 1995. >> LET ME SEE YOUR PAPERS?
I'M KIDDING AROUND, I BELIEVE YOU.
>> ARE ARE YOU APPLYING TO BE A PERMANENT U.S.
CITIZEN. >> I DID.
I GOT TURNED DOWN. I DIDN'T KNOW HOW MANY
REPRESENTATIVES THERE WERE
IN THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES.
>> I DON'T EVEN THINK I KNOW THAT.
>> BETTER SMARTEN UP MEATBALL.
>> THAT'S OKAY I HAVE A MASTERS.
>> MASTER'S DEGREE MASTER'S DEGN BANGLADESH?
>> WHAT IN? >> POLITICAL SCIENCE.
>> LIKE THE JAMES CARVEL OF BANGLADESH.
YOU DON'T KNOW WHO THAT IS. >> THAT'S A SCANDAL.
>> YOU DON'T THINK WE SHOULD BUILD A WALL ON THE BORDER?
>> NO. >> SHOULD WE BUILD A FENCE ON
THE BORDER OF MEXICO? >> YES.
>> A FENCE ON THE CANADIAN BORDER TOO?
>> YEAH, YEAH, YEAH. YEAH.
YEAH. >> THE WALL, SO YOU -- YOU
PREVENT THEIR DREAMS. YOU SHOULD LET THEM COME HERE
LEGALLY, NOT ILLEGALLY. >> WHO SHOULD WE NOT LET?
>> TOURISTS. >> BAN TOURISTS FROM AMERICA?
>> NO. NOT ABOUT THE TOURISTS,
TERRORISTS. >> OH, TERRORISTS.
>> YES. >> I WAS ILLEGAL, EIGHT YEARS
LATER, REAGAN GAVE US THAT AMNESTY AND A COUPLE YEARS
LATER, I BECOME A CITIZEN. >> THIS IS A COUNTRY THAT WAS
FOUNDED ON IMMIGRATION. I WOULD NOT EXCLUDE ANYONE.
>> THIS BELONGS TO MEXICANS. >> MEXICO WAS HERE BEFORE
AMERICA? >> WE HAVE TO SHARE IT.
>> ARE YOU SURE? >> WHAT SHOULD WE DO WITH THE I
WILL ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS RIGHT
NOW? >> HOW THEM OUT.
WE NEED HELP, THAT'S WHY WE'RE HERE.
>> WHAT ABOUT BARACK OBAMA? >> HE'S VERY GOOD.
>> I LOVE OBAMA. >> WHY?
>> HE'S A COOL GUY. >> COOL?
>> MILK, 1.25. MILK, $4.
BUT THE BUSH -- >> SO IT'S BUSH'S FAULT?
>> YES. >> WAIT A MINUTE!
>> BILL O'REILLY ON FOX NEWS CHANNEL.
>> I LIKE HIM A LOT. >> YOU DO?
>> I DON'T KNOW HIM PERSONALLY, GOOD ON TV, THOUGH.
>> ANYTHING YOU WANT TO SAY TO BILL O'REILLY RIGHT NOW?
>> HI, BABY. >> WE ALL LAUGH.
HIGH FIVE. >> HERE NOW IS WATTTERES.
A LOT OF PEOPLE DON'T KNOW THIS. I DROVE A CAB, MIAMI.
WHEN I WAS ACTUALLY AN INTERN DOWN THERE FOR THE ABC STATION.
THEY WEREN'T PAYING ME. I HAD TO GET SOME MONEY.
YOU CAN MAKE A PRETTY GOOD BUCK DRIVING A TAXI CAB.
>> $13 AN HOUR, SO ABOUT $27,000 A YEAR.
A REALLY TOUGH JOB. >> THAT DOESN'T INCLUDE TIPS,
THOUGH. >> IT DOES INCLUDE TIPS.
I ASKED THEM WHO THE WORST TIPPER IS, AND THEY SAID THE
FRENCH. THE WORST TIPPER.
THE BEST TIPPER IS COLLEGE GIRLS AND WALL STREET TRADERS.
>> THE MORE YOU WORK IN THE CAB, THE MORE MONEY YOU MAKE.
THEY CAN MAKE UP TO $50,000, $60,000.
THAT'S WHY PEOPLE COME HERE. >> THEY HAVE COME FOR YEARS, AND
BEGINNING IN THE '60s, THE IRISH, ITALIANS, JEWISH DRIVERS,
THEN RUSSIANS AND WEST INDIANS, AND NOW BANGLADESHIS,
PAKISTANIS, INDIANS. >> I DIDN'T SEE ANY WOMEN?
>> ONE BABE. HAITIAN.
VERY NICE PEOPLE. I DON'T WANT TO SAY ANYTHING
BAD, BECAUSE I'M GOING TO GET RIDES FROM THEM LATER ON.
>> THEY ARE HARD WORKING PEOPLE. NOT SPONGING OFF.
>> "FACTOR" TIP OF THE DAY ABOUT
>> "FACTOR" TIP OF THE DAY ABOUTMY TRIP TO IRELAND, UP NEXT.
